title: Refactor the SQL runtime context
body:
Changes proposed in this pull request:
Refactor the SQL runtime context:
- Add routing mapping attributes to the table
- Remove redundant attributes
- Move from the generic domain to the RAW domain
- The rollback metadata is constructed through the RAW executor, and is now set to the RAW SQL runtime context by extending the route
